desc: Who we are -We are one of Australia’s leading financial advisory firms and service clients Australia wide. Our goal is to be a market leading Financial Advisory firm in Australia known for helping our clients make their money work for them!Quick facts about us  -•	Our head office is in Sydney, Australia.•	We have an internal accounting arm.•	We have internal investment managers and an internal residential property research team.•	We currently have $250million + Funds under management (FUM).•	We have approximately 3,500+ happy clients Australia wide, and that number is growing fast.•	We DO NOT sell products and we are NOT aligned with any banks, superfunds or insurance firms, which allows us to develop unbiased strategies to help clients meet their lifestyle and financial goals with a high level of certainty.The service we provide to our clients•	Cash flow structuring strategies.•	Loan structuring strategies.•	Strategic investment management through shares & exchange traded options.•	Insurance & Risk management solutions.•	Pre & Post retirement planning solutions.•	Estate Planning: Wills, POA, EPOA.•	Superannuation & Self-Managed Super Fund advice.•	Holistic Personal, trust and company tax planning advice.Some of the benefits our clients have achieved•	Home loan & debts paid off 5-15 years earlier.•	Plan to achieve goals with certainty and direction.•	10-15%+ returns p.a. (net of fees) via shares and options.•	Save 10-30%p.a. off your tax bill as a benefit to our process.•	Superannuation advice includes how to purchase property using your super fund, including loan and trust structuring.•	Long term Retirement planning and capital preservation.What We Are Looking For;We are looking for someone with experience in Sales, outgoing calls and appointment setting over the phone.Your duties:•	Make cold calls with the purpose of qualifying a lead and booking an appointment for a financial adviser to follow-up.•	Keeping file notes up-to-date in Zoho CRM.We can offer you•	Hourly rate + bonus per booked qualified lead, or paid by qualified lead.•	Work with a Senior financial adviser.Must have skills required:•	Ability to work flexible hours Mon-fri.•	Believe in the benefit of Financial Advice and the vision of our firm.•	Superior verbal communication skills, must speak fluent English.•	Prior experience making cold calls & converting sales for at least 2 years.•	Computer literacy including experience with using a CRM such as ZOHO (preferred, not necessary).Preferred Experience (not mandatory):•	Basic knowledge in Australian financial planning.
title: Australian Financial Services - Appointment Setter/Telemarketer

desc: Are you social media savvy?Does talking with people feel easy?Do you want to make some serious moolah?If YES, then please apply today!(but read on first) :)A bit about us:We are a full service digital marketing firm that helps businesses stand out online and connect with their audience.We have some of the top creative talent working for us and are looking to grow our sales team to sell our services.A bit about you:You’re an exceptional communicator, have prior experience with sales, know digital marketing in & out; enough to speak intelligently about it.Highly self-motivated and goal oriented. Computer-maestro with a consistently good work ethic.*+ english is your first language ;)A bit about the job:You'll be working as a "strategy consultant" that will ultimately bring in high quality clients who are in need of our Digital Marketing services.You'll be paid an exceptional commission on top of above-market bonuses for contracts closed.($60k per year / $500+ per deal*)What YOU need to succeed:+ Experience in Sales+ Internet & Phone connection+ Knowledge in Digital Marketing & Social Media+ BA or some education in Marketing / Sales Psychology(Or relevant certifications)This job is perfect for anyone looking to make a lot of money, fairly quickly. You can work remotely or in a city near our target markets. (Denver, Seattle, San Francisco) We are 90% a remote team and work well as a unit due to excellent communication.This position is flexible and candidates will work from home mostly. However this is a client facing role, so availability to attend meetings (mainly virtual) is required.If you're serious about proving you've got the chops & ready to close deals, then we'd love to talk!We already have reps that are pulling $60K+ a year just from closing 8 sales a month.
